quality_assessment: Documentation is mostly accurate and comprehensive. The page correctly identifies CLI commands as stub implementations with planned functionality. Minor improvements needed for source reference accuracy and MkDocs Material enhancements.

issues.description: Source reference line numbers are outdated - documentation says src/cli/args.rs:640-659 but actual Retry command definition is at lines 595-615
issues.fix_suggestion: Update source reference line numbers to match current codebase

issues.description: Documentation shows old line number references (src/cli/args.rs:653, 649, 645, 657) that no longer match actual code locations
issues.fix_suggestion: Remove hardcoded line numbers or update to current positions (lines 600-614)

issues.description: Implementation note references src/cook/execution/dlq.rs:202-233 for reprocess method, but actual reprocess method is at lines 209-240
issues.fix_suggestion: Update line reference to current position

issues.description: Page lacks MkDocs Material enhancements for better visual presentation
issues.fix_suggestion: Add admonitions for tips and warnings, code annotations for complex examples, and tabbed content for different formats where applicable

positive_aspects: Clear warning admonition at the top correctly identifies stub implementation status
Comprehensive coverage of all DLQ CLI commands (list, inspect, analyze, retry, export, stats, clear, purge)
Good examples showing command usage patterns with bash code blocks
Accurate parameter descriptions for retry command with default values
Proper explanation of retry behavior including streaming, parallel execution, and state updates
Cross-reference to debugging.md for DLQ integration details
Well-organized with clear command sections and subsections
improvement_suggestions: Add tabbed content blocks to show different output formats (JSON vs CSV for export)
Add code annotations to explain complex command flags
Consider adding info admonitions for tips on common workflows
Add cross-references to related pages (overview.md, internals.md) for deeper context
Update or remove hardcoded source line references that drift over time
Add example outputs for each command to show expected results

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
